subject: Theorize, solution for your problems
body: 3. causal: fyr hrzlo out of fear (Hrbl. 26); fyr rei.i out of anger (Grp. 49); fyr sc.pom norna on account of the decrees of the norns (Fm. 44); hn.gra sa/ halr fyr hiorom the man does not fall by the sword (Ha/v. 158; simil. Skm. 25; cf. also HH. II 10 and the shortened fyrir hn.ga Hrbl. 15); fyrir .a s.c for this reson (Sf.).
